EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Webinar: Is Independence Right For You in 2012? (1325260079.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Webinar: Is Independence Right For You in 2012? (1325260079.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Will do. You have a good new year too. Steve -----Original Message----- From: Keith Chirico [mailto:keith.chirico@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, December 30, 2011 10:46 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners Webinar: Is Independence Right For You in 2012? Steve, thank you very much for the outreach...My intent for independence hasn't changed, just haven't taken the plunge yet...Hopefully this year. Please keep me on your mailing list. Happy New Year! R, Keith On 12/29/11, Steve Arhancet wrote: > Dear Keith, > > Along the way, you shared with us that you have considered independent > consulting as a career path. We appreciate your interest in our > company and the topic of independence. It's a subject we are passionate about. > > Each year, we observe a surge in interest around the topic just after > the holidays from connections new and old. You may be interested in > participating in our pre-New-Years Webinar: > > Title: Is Independent Consulting Right For You? > > Date/Time: Tomorrow, 12/30, at 12:30 PM EST > > Or just reading about our point of view in a recent posting we did. > > Steve > ___________________________________ > Steve Arhancet > Director, Consultant Services > MBO Partners > > t: 703.793.6011 > f: 703.793.6081 > m: 540.560.8837 > e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com > w: www.mbopartners.com > > If you no longer wish to receive these emails, go to the following > link to > unsubscribe: > http://info.mbopartners.com/EnterpriseUnsubscribePage.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons6rAZKXonjHpfsX56uwsWaa%2BlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4AT8JnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D. > >
